errors.notFound: That Discord channel was not found. Make sure that you're not putting `<>` around the name. For example: `twitch notif add #channel twitch_user`.

errors.checkFailure: Je hebt geen permissies om dit command te runnen.
errors.commandOnCooldown: Je kunt dit commando opnieuw uitvoeren binnen {amount} seconden.
errors.badArgument: You entered an invalid argument. Type `twitch help {command}` to view command usage.
errors.reportGenericError: Meld deze fout aan de ontwikkelaars op https://l.disgd.pw/support.
errors.noBanMembers: You need the **Ban Members** permission to do this!
errors.noBotBanMembers: I need the **Ban Members** permission to do this!
errors.noKickMembers: You need the **Kick Members** permission to do this!
errors.noBotKickMembers: I need the **Kick Members** permission to do this!

errors.noManageServer: You need the **Manage Server** permission to do this.
errors.userRegexMismatch: Dat lijkt niet op een geldige Twitch gebruiker. Je kunt alleen, onderstrepen, letters en cijfers gebruiken.

perspective.deletedToxicMessage: {author}, je bericht is verwijderd omdat het de toxicfilter heeft geactiveerd. ({score}/{max})

streamerNotifs.invalidSubcommand: View the **`Streamer Notifications`** section under the help command to view usage.
streamerNotifs.twitchUserDoesNotExist: That Twitch user doesn't exist. Make sure that you're not putting <> around the name, and that you're not @mentioning a Discord user.
streamerNotifs.notifCount: There are {} streamer notification(s) set up for this channel
streamerNotifs.embedContentTooLongFallback: Custom messages weren't included in the embed because there is a Discord-set limit of 1024 characters in a section. They'll still show when the user goes live.
streamerNotifs.noNotifsSetUp: No streamer notifications are set up for this channel.
streamerNotifs.footerAppendedContent: • Join the support server at discord.me/konomi if the embed did not display correctly
streamerNotifs.userNotSetUpForChannel: Either that user doesn't exist or is not set up for that channel.
streamerNotifs.notifRemovedSuccess: You won't get any notifications in {channel} when `{user}` goes live.
streamerNotifs.notifAddedSuccess: You should now receive a message in {channel} when `{user}` goes live.

help.helpIntroMsg: Hallo! <:twitch:404633403603025921> Ik ben een bot die helpt Discord servers te integreren met Twitch.

fields.name: Commands
fields.value:
Als je alle commands wilt zien, typ dan `twitch commands`.

**Zorg ervoor dat je `<>` en `[]` weglaat bij het gebruik van de commando's, ze zijn alleen voor de help pagina.**

fields.name: Support
fields.value: Heb je een fout gevonden of problemen met de bot? Join dan de Discord server [hier](https://discordapp.com/invite/UNYzJqV) en het support team zal je helpen.

fields.name: Invite
fields.value: [Klik hier](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=375805687529209857&permissions=8&scope=bot&response_type=code&redirect_uri=https://twitch.disgd.pw/thanks.html) Om de bot te inviten voor je server.

fields.name: Website
fields.value: Je kunt mijn bezoeken op https://twitch.disgd.pw.

fields.name: FAQ
fields.value: Veel Gestelde Vragen en antwoorden worden [hier](https://twitch.disgd.pw/how-to.html) vermeld.

fields.name: Upvote
fields.value: [Upvote me on DBL](https://discordbots.org/bot/twitch/vote) to get access to audio.

fields.name: Donate
fields.value: Want to help keep me running on Discord, and get a couple rewards for doing so? Visit my Patreon at https://patreon.com/devakira.

fields.name: About
fields.value: Statistieken bekijken en meer, typ dan `twitch info`. Ik ben gemaakt bij Akira#4587 met discord.py herschreven.

fields.name: Partners
fields.value: We're looking for passionate Twitch streamers who use TwitchBot. Apply and get exclusive rewards: https://twitch.disgd.pw/partners

fields.name: :flag_us: :flag_gb: :flag_es: :flag_br: :flag_fr: :flag_jp:
fields.value:
Wil je TwitchBot vertalen naar jouw taal?  We're hiring volunteer translators to make TwitchBot available in multiple languages!

**Apply here if you're interested: https://twitch.disgd.pw/translators**

commands.commandsIntroMsg: **Do not put `<>` or `[]` around command arguments.**

fields.name: General
fields.value:
`twitch help` - Shows bot help
`twitch info` - Shows bot info
`twitch invite` - Displays a link to add TwitchBot to your server
`twitch status` - Shows bot status
`twitch ping` - Pong!

fields.name: Twitch
fields.value:
`twitch user <user>` - Gets info on a Twitch channel
`twitch stream user <user>` - Gets info on a user's stream
`twitch stream watch <user>` - Watch a Twitch stream from Discord
`twitch stream game <name>` - Watch someone stream the specified game
`twitch stream top` - Fetches info on a top stream
`twitch game <name>` - Gets info on a Twitch game
`twitch top` - Gets the most popular Twitch games

fields.name: Clips
fields.value:
`twitch clips from <user>` - Gets a clip from the specified Twitch user
`twitch clips trending` - Gets a trending clip
`twitch clips game <game>` - Gets a clip from the specified game

fields.name: Streamer Notifications & Live Users
fields.value:
`twitch notif add <#discord_channel> <twitch_username> [message]` - Adds a streamer notification for a streamer to the specified channel
`twitch notif remove <#discord_channel> <twitch_username> [message]` - Remove a streamer notification for a streamer to the specified channel
`twitch notif list [#discord_channel]` - Lists the streamer notifications for the specified channel
`twitch live_check <role_name>` - Adds the specified role to users when they go live on Twitch, and then removes the role when they stop streaming

fields.name: Audio
fields.value:
`twitch listen <user>` - Listen to a Twitch stream in the current voice channel
`twitch nowplaying` - Shows the stream currently playing, if any
`twitch leave` - Leaves a voice channel

fields.name: Moderation
fields.value:
`twitch ban <@user> [reason]` - Bans a user
`twitch kick <@user> [reason]` - Kicks a user
`twitch purge <amt>` - Deletes <amt> messages from the channel
`twitch filter set <sensitivity>` - Sets the server-wide toxicity filter
`twitch filter remove` - Removes the server-wide toxicity filter

fields.name: Game Stats
fields.value:
`twitch overwatch <pc/psn/xbl> <player>` - Shows Overwatch player stats
`twitch fortnite <pc/psn/xbl> <player>` - Shows Fortnite player stats
`twitch rl <pc/psn/xbl> <player>` - Shows Rocket League player stats

audio.authorNotInVoiceChannel: You need to be in a voice channel!
audio.notUpvoted:
<:twitch:404633403603025921> You need to upvote TwitchBot to listen to streams! Upvote here -> <https://discordbots.org/bot/375805687529209857/vote>. If you just upvoted, please allow up to 5 minutes for the upvote to process.
**Want to skip upvoting?** You can become a patron at <https://patreon.com/devakira> to listen without upvoting.
audio.userNotOnline: <:twitch:404633403603025921> This user doesn't exist or is not currently streaming. If you entered the channel's url, try again with just the name.
audio.downloadError: <:twitch:404633403603025921> This user doesn't exist or is not currently streaming.

liveCheck.noManageServer: You need the **Manage Server** permission to do this.
liveCheck.noLiveCheckSetUp: No live check has been set up for this server. To add live checking, type `twitch live_check role`.
liveCheck.liveCheckRemoved: Successfully removed live checking from this server.
liveCheck.currentLiveCheck: Live checking is currently set up to give the `{role}` role to streamers who go live. If you want to delete live checking, type `twitch live_check --delete`.
liveCheck.noRoleFound: Could not find a role with the name `{}`. Make sure to only enter the role's name, and not the @mention.
liveCheck.liveCheckSetUpSuccess: Users in this server who go live on Twitch will receive the `{}` role.
liveCheck.userNotLiveAuditLog: User no longer live on Twitch
liveCheck.noBotManageRoles: I need the **`Manage Roles`** permission to do this. If I have the permission, then make sure to drag the role named `TwitchBot` above the role you want to live check with.

moderation.banFailed: Deze gebruiker kon niet worden verbannen. Hebben ze een hogere rol dan ik?
moderation.kickFailed: Deze gebruiker kon niet worden gekickt. Hebben ze een hogere rol dan ik?
moderation.invalidMsgAmt: Je kunt niet meer dan 99 of minder dan 2 berichten verwijderen.
moderation.banSuccess: **{user}** is met succesvol verbannen met de reden **{reason}**
moderation.kickSuccess: **{user}** is met succesvol gekickt met de reden **{reason}**

moderation.invalidSensitivity: Gevoeligheid mag niet boven 85 of onder 60 zijn.
